about_the_game:
🧀🧀 Billie’s Wheelie 🧀🧀

is an adventure racing platformer that brings a unique twist to the genre. Take control of Billie, an adventurous cute hamster in a high-speed ball, as you roll through vibrant environments, challenging levels. Navigate through a series of dynamic tracks, each filled with clever obstacles and challenging jumps designed to test your reflexes and strategic controlling skills.

🧀 2 to 8 Player Online Co-op! 🧀

The game offers both solo and multiplayer modes, allowing you to race against your friends!, gather up your friends you can play together to 8 players!

Your goal is simple! reach the final line and collect cheese pieces while going though different areas and challenging your opponents.

Cheese pieces give you an exciting rewards for every level!

🧀 It's a FUN GAME! 🧀

In addition to the core racing action, Billie’s Wheelie have some hidden funny secrets and Easter eggs that add an extra layer of fun. Keep your eyes peeled for these surprises as you zoom through the levels.

🧀 Great Content On The Way! 🧀

Currently, the game includes a Career Mode, and will include a variety of arcade-style challenges and modes, with more content coming on the way!

Whether you’re playing casually or seeking competitive thrills, Billie’s Wheelie promises endless entertainment and a delightful racing experience.

Get ready to roll, race, and cheeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeese your way to VICTORY!

name: Billie's Wheelie Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit/32 bit) or Newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit/32 bit) or Newer
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual core or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Billie's Wheelie is an adventure racing platformer game, You can play it with up to 8 players Co-op/PvP, Playing as a hamster in his ball trying to beat all challenges, Collecting all cheese pieces for rewards, And beating your friend's time records.
